name: Cal Aggie Flying Farmers, Inc.
about: Cal Aggie Flying Farmers, Inc., established in 1947, is the oldest general aviation operation in the Sacramento, California area. As a non-profit organization, we are dedicated to serving the local aviation community by providing safe aircraft at reasonable rates and professional instruction. Located at the University Airport (KEDU), our facility offers a quaint and relaxing environment, free from congested airspaces. We have a fleet of 8 aircraft for private pilot training and 6 for instrument ratings, including a Piper Seminole for multiengine training. Our experienced instructors offer one-on-one training, and we utilize state-of-the-art equipment, including a G-1000 equipped C-172SP and a Redbird flight simulator. Every member is named insured on our aircraft policy, eliminating the need for renters insurance. We welcome all to join and experience the joy of flying in a supportive and educational environment.
